column2: ggplot(House_2018, aes(dem_margin, total_spent, color = can_party)) + geom_point(size = .4) + geom_smooth(method = loess, se = FALSE) + coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 9831182)) + scale_color_manual(breaks = c("democrat", "green", "independent", "libertarian", "other", "republican"), values = c("blue", "green", "purple", "orange", "yellow", "red"))
